dmca.title: Name forgery (Defamation ?)
dmca.body:
meskerem@erols.com





 
Dear sir..
 I thank you for your rapid reply.
But yet may request was not fully understood i gues !
To go on ditails of the issue, I wil explain the crooks
down below...
As i have indicated on may earlier e-mail to you, may 
probleem is infact with the gentleman who logs in in
Meskerem Forum with a username "kalab tesfe".
 
I request you kindly to inform the gentleman not 
delibretely to abus may true name.
 
The username he is using is may true name. and i dont
wont to be associated or share his ideas and contributions.
 
Of course this it could be a mater of coincidence.
we might have a similar names witch i doubt very much, even
though it is yet not the end of the road to solve the mater.
 
considering the privacy regulation maters of your work , i prefer your intervention to solve the mater.
 
Is there a chance that i can come in contact with the gentlman?
I wil be glad to sort it aut direct.
 
May apology for this inconvenience and i thank you ones more
taking time on this mater.
 
frendly gr
